body: I have tried [this example](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=chriswmackey&fork=hydra_2&id=Urban_Weather_Generator_Workflow&slide=0&scale=1.5157165665103975&offset=-30.406441689767576,-111.98117539108989) but when I try to run the UWG component, the ballooon informs me that there is an error: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1Zim0q07FppuJqOGoStGRuPS8TG2g4R2BRbQX89pV1m*b1N5rmEO97hirXPVF9zxyvQh*wbAhIwdJQBNrzskAXUgszDcSJ1K/Cattura_UWG.JPG) This appears because the .epw file in the folder has a different name: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/1Zim0q07FppQqABT-4s2TDtpR4Vvsoba7LQHAoeUuPow2meMqc*iz-wYKfVTxOqSO8NaNFfGerTXZfI2kbtENIXqY-WfnsfK/Cattura_folder.JPG) So I have to rename the .epw file from "unnamed_USA_FL_Miami.Intl.AP.722020_TMY3-7231-72924" to "unnamed_USA_FL_Miami.Intl.AP.722020_TMY3.epw" and it works properly.

replies.body: Hi Francesco, I suggest to add this as a bug to dragonfly repository.

Francesco,

I don't know exactly what is going on here but I am glad that you were able to find a way to fix it.  Hopefully this all gets cleared up in the revision of Dragonfly that I am doing now to work with the new UWG.

-Chris
